references: Repealing: Ord 2708, Ord 3380, Ord 3777, Ord 4947, Ord 6103, Ord 6680, Ord 6880, Ord 7420, Ord 8430, Ord 8563, Ord 8781, Ord 10813, Ord 11310, Ord 13502
summary: An Ordinance to regulate the keeping of certain animals and fowls within the limits of the City of Seattle, prescribing limits within which certain animals and fowls shall not be permitted to run at large, providing for the impounding of animals and fowls found running at large in violation of this ordinance and for the sale and redemption of the same, providing penalties for the violation of the provisions of this ordinance and repealing Ordinance No. 2708, entitled "An Ordinance to regulate the keeping of certain animals and fowls within certain limits, and providing a penalty", approved April 13, 1893 and Ordinance Nos. 3380, 3777, 4947, 6103, 6680, 6880, 7420, 8430, 8563, 8781, 10813, 11310 and 13502, amendatory thereof.
